attributes.action: Abolish the Monarchy and Replace with a Republic
attributes.additional_details: It is time that the UK abolish the Monarchy. In a time when millions are in poverty and in the winter having to choose between heating or eating, it is totally absurd to keep subsidizing this out of date and wholly undemocratic system which legitimizes inequality. Its simple - the Monarchy needs to be abolished and replaced by an elected head of state.
